p: The damage of the gastric mucosa is mainly associated with pepsin activity and hypersecretion of HCl by the action of H +-K +-ATPase [ 179, 180]. Flavonoids such as karanjin [ 133], rutin [ 66], kolaviron [ 139], baicalein [ 81], quercitrin and afzelin [ 68] inhibited the H +-K +-ATPase in experimental models in vitro and in vivo (in rodents), presenting anti-secretory effect.
